Name: oid
Description: Row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly\nselected)

Name: amopfamily
Description: The operator family this entry is for

Name: amoplefttype
Description: Left-hand input data type of operator

Name: amoprighttype
Description: Right-hand input data type of operator

Name: amoppurpose
Description: Operator purpose, either s for search\nor o for ordering

Name: amopmethod
Description: Index access method operator family is for

Name: amopsortfamily
Description: The btree operator family this entry sorts according to, if an\nordering operator; zero if a search operator
